1123014115725910019.text: Glyphosate herbicides kill milkweed, monarch butterflies' only food source. As the use of these herbicides has skyrocketed, the monarch butterfly population has declined by more than 80% in the last 20 years. Tell the EPA to take action:https://on.nrdc.org/2LkCadY

1123346336819097601.text: Elephants need our protection, and there's no time to spare; between 2010 and 2012, over 100,000 African elephants were killed for their ivory. Take a stand, and demand the Trump administration upholds strong ivory regulations:https://on.nrdc.org/2IBjmHv
